name: Scientist Spacegirl DASH
description:
Press [X] or [Space] to Jump
Press [Z] to Grab and Throw (requires Grabber Claw)
Press [Enter] to Pause

Thanks for playing the Teaching a Robot to Love game! Check out the musical at teachingarobottolove.com and share your fun with hashtag #tartlmusical!

Music by Aaron Wilson and The Doubleclicks
Game by @RealKevinCole
